title: Host a Weekend Open House
description: An agent is hosting an open house and must manage marketing, setup, and visitor follow-up.

tasks.description: Market the open house on the MLS, Zillow, and social media platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Marketing posts are created and scheduled for the week leading up to the event.

tasks.description: During the open house, greet visitors and use a digital sign-in sheet to capture their contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects contact information from at least 10 potential buyers.

tasks.description: Send a follow-up email to all attendees thanking them for coming and asking for feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: A follow-up campaign is executed the next day.
